author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Scientists have developed the Benozzi Method, a dual-action eye drop treatment combining pilocarpine and diclofenac to improve near vision in people with presbyopia. This non-invasive approach can enhance near visual acuity by an average of 3.45 Jaeger lines, with effects lasting up to two years.

Source Article: https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2025/09/250914205832.htm

#medicine #discovery #breakthrough #technology #shorts
